Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-307, see notes following ยง 50-1331.01.

DC CODE ยง 50-1331.06

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Department shall issue a Rebuilt Salvage Title if the owner has been issued a Salvage Title and passed inspection.
Ownership of a Rebuilt Salvage Vehicle shall be transferred only through the use of a Rebuilt Salvage Title.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Salvage Title, Flood Notification, and Non-Repairable Vehicle Certification.
